findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The function _mint(address,uint256) allows minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens.

findings.title: Smart contract owner can appoint dapp contract address
findings.description: The smart contract owner has the ability to set the DApp contract address, which may pose a centralization risk.

findings.title: Smart contract owner can set trading pair
findings.description: The smart contract owner has the ability to set reward treasury tax and reward fund through functions setRewardTreasuryTax() and setRewardFund().
